name: The Seven (itch) (Rimorzell)
description:
You are visiting your dad's old mansion to find his scripts on the Paranormal . There are in total 7 pages to collect. Try to survive.  Welcome to The Seven. A downloadable short horror game for windows.

Note: This game is for Windows 64-bit versions.

DOWNLOAD TIPS First person Horror Game You need WinRAR or 7Zip to extract the downloaded game files.     Once you extracted the files with one of these programs, find and open the extracted folder and run the executable file found inside to run the game.
